render(text("DEF"));
gives:

-----
ABC DEF
1 22222
The Figure xxx 
A = box(size(100), lineColor("black"), lineWidth(2), fillColor("green"));
B = ellipse(size(100), lineColor("black"), lineWidth(1), fillColor("yellow"));
render(hcat( [A, B, A], gap(10)));
will be displayed as
